channel.title: Projects on Parker Addison
channel.description: Recent content in Projects on Parker Addison

item.title: QWERTY vs Dvorak
item.description: Why are we stuck typing on the same keyboard layout that was invented for the earliest typewriters? The Dvorak keyboard layout is fabled to be much more efficient… come play with this interactive data visualization and put that claim to the test!

item.title: Indeed Job Search City Recommender
item.description: My team represented UCSD at the 2018 ASA DataFest, hosted at Chapman University.

item.title: The Verbosified Works on A.I. Space Rovers
item.description: I (ab)used OpenAI’s GPT-2 model—the one that’s "too dangerous to release"—to make an art piece which doubles the word count of my high school essay by injecting machine-generated fluff text.
